import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function EditObituary () { const { id } = useParams(); const [ obituary, setObituary ] = useState( [] ); useEffect( () => { axios.get( 'http://localhost:8081/read/' + id ) .then( res => { console.log( res ) setObituary( res.data ); } ) .catch( err => console.log( err ) ); }, [] ); const [ values, setValues ] = useState( { fname: obituary.fname, lname: obituary.lname, dob: obituary.dob, dod: obituary.dod, country: obituary.country, city: obituary.city, religion: obituary.religion, images: obituary.images, certificates: obituary.certificates, title: obituary.title, donation: obituary.donation, description: obituary.description, name: obituary.name, email: obituary.email, contactNo: obituary.contactNo, nic: obituary.nic } ); return (

EDIT YOUR OBITUARY ....

{/* for personal information */ }

Person's Information

setValues( { ...values, fname: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, lname: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, dob: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, dod: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, country: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, city: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, images: e.target.value } ) } />
setValues( { ...values, certificates: e.target.value } ) } />
{/* for more information */ }

More Information

setValues( { ...values, title: e.target.value } ) } required />
{/* for user information */ }

Your Contact Details

setValues( { ...values, name: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, email: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, contactNo: e.target.value } ) } required />
setValues( { ...values, nic: e.target.value } ) } required />
) } export default EditObituary
